attributeCmsDescription:
1. 1.       Class Participation

The class participation covers students’ participation, attendance, country analysis, and case study presentations. You are expected to arrive punctual, read the materials before class, and contribute ideas and insights that enrich the learning process.  You are not allowed to engage in personal discussions, read other materials or attend to other assignments, use electronic devices such as laptop, tablet and smartphone unless there is prior approval for accommodation.  If you have a reason to leave early or absent from class, notify the instructor in advance.  If you are absent for medical reasons, please provide the doctor’s note.

 

  1. 2.       Assignment 1: Individual Research Paper

This Assignment will act as a mid-exam. Each student should compose an individual research essay 4000 words exclusive of references and refer class notes for detailed research paper structure (The following list is subject to change and students will be informed duly).

 

Research Paper Topic

ASEAN Country Focus

1.       ASEAN Integration: Contemporary challenges, risks and opportunities for global investors (Governance styles, Religious sensitives, political scenario amongst others).

Open
  1. Financial Services and Capital Markets of ASEAN: Challenges and Opportunities

Singapore and Indonesia
  1. Travel and Tourism business in ASEAN: Key issues, Trends and Policies

Philippines and Indonesia
  1. Women in Workforce in ASEAN or Women Entrepreneurs in ASEAN or Women Leadership in ASEAN

Myanmar, Vietnam and Philippines
  1. Environment issues in ASEAN and business impact (Climate change; bio diversity; marine life)

Philippines and Indonesia
  1. Managing human resources and skill changes in ASEAN

Thailand and Malaysia
  1. ASEAN business risk factors analysis and investor confidence (Integrity, Political and Security)

Any 2 countries of ASEAN
  1. Digitalization of trade and impact on ASEAN business (Explain how traditional roles of international trade sector will undergo change and what will be the impact on the skills/talents to meet these changes. How will digitalization impact the ASEAN businesses and where are the growth opportunities and challenges?)

Singapore and Thailand
  1. ASEAN consumer market and consumers: The changing face

(ASEAN has the highest smartphone penetration with a growing

                 millennial population. How has the ASEAN consumer trends?

                 products, and services shifted in recent times? What are the

                 various aspects business needs to consider in its consumer

                 engagement approach as it prepares for increasing global and

                  regional competition?

Singapore and Indonesia
  1. 10.    ASEAN’s infrastructure: Growth opportunities

                ASEAN’s infrastructure spending demands an increasing spent,

                 with an estimate of S$110 billion per annum (UNCTAD 2015) for

                 robust regional physical and digital connectivity, what are the

                 various concerns that the companies should prepare and plan

                for? What advantages do emerging economies like Thailand,

                Indonesia and Vietnam in comparison to developed countries     

                Like Singapore?  Explore the various regulations and connectivity  

                 gaps in the market? Where are the major investment     

                  opportunities?

Thailand, Vietnam and Indonesia
  1. 11.    Supply chain of ASEAN business

Philippines, Myanmar, Malaysia

 

 

  1. 3.       Assignment 2a: Group Project Case Document and Presentation (Section 1 and 2) (Peer Evaluation)

Assignment 2a, accounts for submission of Section 1 and 2 of the final project of case writing document and its presentation. Assignment 2a, will be presented as part of the midterm assignment in Week 7 and will be peer evaluated through a rubric, accounting for 10% of the assignment score.

 

 

  1. 4.       Assignment 2b Final Project (Group)

 

Choose any one ASEAN country. Expanding assignment 1, choose any of the business issue from the list (as mentioned for assignment 1). In your preferred ASEAN country choose an industry /corporation/business to design the assignment case study. For assignment case study please refer to class details. This assignment is divided in two parts

 

 

Assignment 2b, accounts for submission of the complete case study document and its presentation. Assignment 2b, will be presented in the week 13 and accounts for 40% of the assignment score.

attributeCmsDescription:
Study Program Specific Outcomes

SO-1

Able to analyze a complex computing problem and to apply principles of computing and other relevant disciplines to identify solutions.

L.Obj 1.1

Able to identify the needs of databases for complex computing problems.

L.Obj 1.2

Able to analyze computational problems based on a multidisciplinary approach.

SO-2

Able to design, implement, and evaluate a computing-based solution to meet a given set of computing requirements in the context of the program’s discipline.

L.Obj 2.1

Able to design computer-based information systems.

L.Obj 2.3

Able to evaluate a computing-based solution based on the requirements of information systems.

SO-3

Able to communicate effectively in a variety of professional contexts.

L.Obj 3.2

Able to communicate the implementation of information systems in writing, designing and prototyping.

SO-4

Able to recognize professional responsibilities and make informed judgments in computing practice based on legal and ethical principles.

L.Obj 4.2

Able to implement the developed computer-based information systems according to the context and applied situation based on legal and ethical principles

SO-6

Able to support the delivery, use, and management of information systems within an information systems environment.

L.Obj 6.1

Able to apply management of information systems principles to identify solutions

L.Obj 6.2

Able to provide information systems solutions that meet the needs of stakeholders.
